001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.jsonrpc;
002
003import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Flowable;
004import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Maybe;
005import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.ChainTip;
006import org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.ChainTipClient;
007import org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.ChainTipService;
008import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.AsyncSupport;
009import org.consensusj.rx.jsonrpc.RxJsonRpcClient;
010
011/**
012 * A JSON-RPC client interface that provides ChainTipService
013 */
014public interface RxJsonChainTipClient extends ChainTipService, ChainTipClient, RxJsonRpcClient {
015
016    /**
017     * Repeatedly once-per-new-block poll a method
018     *
019     * @param method A supplier (should be an RPC Method) that can throw {@link Exception}.
020     * @param <RSLT> The type of the expected result
021     * @return An Observable for the expected result type, so we can expect one call to {@code onNext} per block.
022     */
023    default <RSLT> Flowable<RSLT> pollOnNewBlock(AsyncSupport.ThrowingSupplier<RSLT> method) {
024        return Flowable.fromPublisher(chainTipPublisher()).flatMapMaybe(tip -> pollOnce(method));
025    }
026
027    /**
028     * Get the active chain tip if there is one (useful for polling clients)
029     *
030     * @return The active ChainTip if available (onSuccess) otherwise onComplete (if not available) or onError (if error occurred)
031     */
032    default Maybe<ChainTip> currentChainTipMaybe() {
033        return pollOnce(this::getChainTips)
034                .mapOptional(ChainTip::findActiveChainTip);
035    }
036}
